channel.title: I'm going crazy!
channel.description:
I've been trying to make a server for that past 5 days *ahem* sorry not make just TEST to see if it will go online. And I can't get it I don't know why!!!! I'm portforwarded(at least I think) I even used port checker to see if it was opened and it said yes. I'm on a laptop thats using wifi does that make a difference? I'm using the Exion source/client and I can play from local host but as soon as I change to no-ip on the client it just says "error connecting to server" what is wrong! Do I need ethernet connection could it be the client am I portforwarding the wrong way.
I have verizon and they have a pretty limited way to portforward so I'm not sure if its that or what. I need help please just help me this sucks so bad I have no problem editing server and everything I just need to get it online I will do anything. Need screenshots what? ANYTHING I will give any information please please please help this sucks so bad. What about that teamviewer thing I'll do whatever.
EDIT:
- Yes I followed the 2 tutorials in the help/tutorial section. - I have no-ip - port checker says 43594 is open. - I have verizon so you can't access the router you do it from verizon if anyone has done this please help me - I have edited the client.java and put my no-ip - After all these great things it still says "error connecting to server" - IS IT BECAUSE I'M USING WIFI????

item.title: I'm going crazy!
item.dc:creator: @GnarlyUnicorn GnarlyUnicorn
item.description:
@GnarlyUnicorn wrote:

[quote=“nardoscape, post:2, topic:355726”]You ever try this tutorial?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html[/quote]

Dude was that a joke? Of course I have researched my ass off for 5 days I looked at that tutorial numerous times.

Its not getting JDK or even really portforwarding. Its about getting the server online which none of the tutorials show how to do. Man I need help I even use port checker and it says 43594 is open and then the server won’t go online WTF.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm going crazy!
item.dc:creator: @GnarlyUnicorn GnarlyUnicorn
item.description:
@GnarlyUnicorn wrote:

I’ve been trying to make a server for that past 5 days ahem sorry not make just TEST to see if it will go online. And I can’t get it I don’t know why!!! I’m portforwarded(at least I think) I even used port checker to see if it was opened and it said yes. I’m on a laptop thats using wifi does that make a difference? I’m using the Exion source/client and I can play from local host but as soon as I change to no-ip on the client it just says “error connecting to server” what is wrong! Do I need ethernet connection could it be the client am I portforwarding the wrong way.

I have verizon and they have a pretty limited way to portforward so I’m not sure if its that or what. I need help please just help me this sucks so bad I have no problem editing server and everything I just need to get it online I will do anything. Need screenshots what? ANYTHING I will give any information please please please help this sucks so bad. What about that teamviewer thing I’ll do whatever.

EDIT:

  • Yes I followed the 2 tutorials in the help/tutorial section.
  • I have no-ip
  • port checker says 43594 is open.
  • I have verizon so you can’t access the router you do it from verizon if anyone has done this please help me
  • I have edited the client.java and put my no-ip
  • After all these great things it still says “error connecting to server”
  • IS IT BECAUSE I’M USING WIFI???

Read full topic
